about_the_game:
HELLO EXO is an addictive sci-fi strategy game. There is no life on Earth in 2072 but humanity has managed to create aging-stopping hibernation pods.

Pods with cold sleep people are on the spaceship, orbiting the Earth. Because the ship's hyperdrive is damaged, you are unable to hyperspace jump to the exoplanet. You must repair the spaceship in order for it to fly. This is one of your tasks!

Spaceship Repair & Hibernation Pods

The spaceship in orbit requires repair. Life in hibernation pods must be sustained. Artificial Intelligence will assist you! Throughout the game, you will develop technologies that will enable you to rebuild the spaceship's hyperdrive and make a space jump.




People in pods are constantly connected to drips that serve them. You must, among other things, ensure that they have access to the necessary substances.

Exoplanet transformation

HELLO EXO will travel you to the amazing world of the exoplanet. This is where you will build a new home. You will confront the exoplanet, discover what resources it possesses, and use them to produce everything needed to turn it into a livable environment ready for the arrival of the spaceship.


The Earth Return Theory

Throughout the game, you will have the opportunity to test whether the Earth Return Theory is true. Even though life on Earth no longer exists, daredevils in pods secretly wish to return there.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (64-Bit)
  • Processor: i5-3570 3.4 GHz 4 Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card, GTX 770 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: It is the year 2072. Recent research has revealed how to locate an Earth-like exoplanet. You were shipped there. Your mission is to repair the spaceship, keep people in hibernation pods alive, and prepare the exoplanet for their arrival.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
